attributes.action: Get involved with running the country rather than ruining it!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent budget increases mean that the "normal working person" has less money to be able to live.  Cut benefits to people who dont want to work, abolish child benefit, raise the national minimum wage to a realistic amount, give companies tax breaks to employ people who want to work, those with children should be provided with a free a creche facility within the building.  Stop increasing the tax on fuel, the railways are too expensive and packed, the roads are blocked with roadworks, the buses run when they feel like it.  Not everyone works, lives or commutes to a City or Town.

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action. Also there are a number of existing petitons that cover the issues that you have raised. Please use our search facility to find the appropriate ones.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
